com.jrefinery.chart.combination
Class AbstractAxisRange

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.jrefinery.chart.combination.AbstractAxisRange
All Implemented Interfaces:
AxisRange
Direct Known Subclasses:
DateAxisRange, NumberAxisRange
public abstract class AbstractAxisRange
extends java.lang.Object
implements AxisRange

Abstract implementation of AxisRange interface. AxisRange is an interface used by CombinedPlot to represent the min/max range of an axis. This allows general algorithms to operate on dates and numerical ranges.
